text: Dr Kwong is the best GP I have ever seen and I feel very safe under his care. He is extremely thorough and is clearly passionate about medicine. I fully trust him as he is a logical and evidence based thinker and goes above and beyond for each patient. He has great communication skills and is very empathetic. Thank you for such excellent care.
Dr Kwong Seh Meng is dedicated and friendly to the patients.  The clinic is new and bright and the staff are friendly.

Dr Kwong is totally a 5 star doctor! He is friendly and caring. Very thorough and patient with the checks and diagnosis.  He even go-the-extra-mile to demonstrate to my son how to use the inhaler, making sure he knows how to use it properly. Best GP I have seen! Highly recommend!

I know by giving another glowing review of Dr Kwong, I might risk seeing a longer queue.  But he is certainly the best GP I’ve ever met.  Caring and clear diagnosis.  Super helpful and willing to listen.

Dr Kwong is an incredibly empathetic and kind GP. Been so lucky to find someone like him. He doesn’t jump to conclusions. Is methodical in his problem solving and diagnosis, and has a really well equipped clinic.
